import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import {useForm} from 'react-hook-form'; import './css/NewRecipe.css'; function NewRecipe() { const {register, handleSubmit, errors} = useForm(); const onSubmit = (data) => { console.log(data); alert("Form is submitted"); }; return (
) } export default NewRecipe;
